column.name: organizer_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Organizer where name = '${organizer-spartan-race}'

column.name: location_name
column.value: Base Jaime II, Palma de Mallorca

column.name: location_country_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Country where name = '${country-spain}'

column.name: event_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Event where name = '${2018-spartan-race-super-mallorca}' and start_date = '2018-03-03'
